name: multiplicity_addValuation_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsDomain R
p : R
hp : Prime p
r : R
⊢ Eq ((multiplicity_addValuation hp) r) (emultiplicity p r)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem multiplicity_addValuation_apply {hp : Prime p} {r : R} :
    multiplicity_addValuation hp r = emultiplicity p r :=
  rfl
